business_and_financial_ops.title: Business & Financial Operations
business_and_financial_ops.summary: Plan, analyze, and improve operations across teams. Common settings include corporate offices, consulting, and government.

installation_maintenance_repair.title: Installation, Maintenance & Repair
installation_maintenance_repair.summary: Keep systems and equipment running. Work often happens on-site, in facilities, plants, and the field.

sales_and_related.title: Sales & Related
sales_and_related.summary: Connect customers with solutions. Roles range from retail and inside sales to account management and marketing support.

protective_service.title: Protective Service
protective_service.summary: Protect people, property, and processes with clear procedures and vigilance.

quality_inspection.title: Quality Inspection
quality_inspection.summary: Ensure products and processes meet standards and safety requirements.

healthcare_support.title: Healthcare Support
healthcare_support.summary: Support patients and clinical teams with hands-on care and coordination.

office_and_admin_support.title: Office & Administrative Support
office_and_admin_support.summary: Keep operations moving with documentation, scheduling, and customer support.

computer_and_math.title: Computer & Mathematical
computer_and_math.summary: Analyze data and build systems that power decisions and products.

life_physical_sciences.title: Life & Physical Sciences
life_physical_sciences.summary: Investigate, test, and document findings in lab and field environments.
